help: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds
description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds

nodes.html: <a data-token="--color-primary" class="inline-flex h-10 items-center justify-center rounded-md px-4 py-2 text-sm font-medium transition-colors focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50 bg-primary text-primary-fg hover:bg-primary/90 h-10 rounded-xl bg-success px-4 text-sm font-semibold text-success-foreground shadow-elevation-3 hover:brightness-110" href="/cms/shop/demo/pages/new/builder">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 3.8 (foreground color: #1a1a1a, background color: #2a6df4, font size: 10.5pt (14px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1
